name: 2D shooter (vocare4)
description:
This is my 2D Shooter Project.

Modifications:

  1.  Added more complex levels.
  2.  Have added a boss for level 3.
  3.  Added moving asteroids.

Future modifications:

  1.  Changing music and sound effects
  2.  Visually adding ship's thrusters and number of lives
  3.   Adding powerups
